name: TrisHome
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tris Home is an IPC camera, you can securely monitor your home by using APP on smartphone or web on PC.

Now, with the skill Tris Home you can open camera stream by voice.

HOW TO GET CONNECTED:
1. Search the "Tris Home" skill on Alexa app
2. Tap the 'Enable' button
3. Enter your Tris Home account and password to link your Tris Home account
4. Select a device to bind
5.After your Tris Home account has been successfully linked. 

TIPS: To use this skill, you need to specify the name and password of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the Tris Home App.

LIST OF COMMANDS:
- Alexa, show camera.
